name: Roll the Ball: slide puzzle 2
description:
ROLL THE BALL: SLIDE PUZZLE 2 IS
● A stimulating, thought-provoking puzzle game with strategic objectives to tease your brain
● Completely Free to Play with simple operation, but challenging to master
● A family-friendly puzzle game, also great for children to enjoy
● Numerous levels are available to complete with new updates

HOW TO PLAY
◉ Roll the ball(s) across the tiles with your fingertip to make a passageway
◉ Discover the optimal path for your balls to reach the goal
◉ Use special tiles strategically to facilitate & maximize your process
◉ Aim to receive 3 stars for each level to earn top scores & set new records

FEATURES
● Classic but Unique Design: A Distinctive game design with easy to navigate playboard
● Timed Play Mode: A separate mode for timed play! See how fast you can find hidden paths
● Useful Hints are available to help your gameplay
● Bonus Rewards and Special Prizes are available (Please check your inbox)
● WIFI is not required: Roll the Ball: Slide Puzzle 2 can be played offline
● An AD-Free Mode is available with an optional in-app purchase
